quotes.message: Don't show off every day, or you'll stop surprising people. There must always be some novelty left over. The person who displays a little more of it each day keeps up expectations, and no one ever discovers the limits of his talent.
quotes.name: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.message: You should encourage a child to show off. You can say to a child, 'Stop being rude,' 'Stop shouting,' 'Stop jumping around on the furniture.' But 'Stop showing off'? That's awful.
quotes.name: Charles Dance

quotes.message: He (the Sage) does not show off, therefore he shines.
quotes.name: Laozi

quotes.message: If you do something too good, then, after a while, if you don't watch it, you start showing off. And then you're not as good any more.
quotes.name: J.D. Salinger

quotes.message: A kung fu man lives without being dependant on the opinions of others, and a master, unlike the beginner, holds himself in reserve. He is quiet and unassuming, with no desire to show off.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Power doesn't have to show off. Power is confident, self-assuring, self-starting and self-stopping, self-warming and self-justifying. When you have it, you know it.
quotes.name: Ralph Ellison

quotes.message: Showing off is the fool's idea of glory.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: You know the bad thing about being a survivor... You keep having to get into difficult situations in order to show off your gift.
quotes.name: Carrie Fisher

quotes.message: Knowledge is like underwear. It is useful to have it, but not necessary to show it off.
quotes.name: Nicky Gumbel

quotes.message: Vanity, showing off, is an attitude that reduces spirituality to a worldly thing, which is the worst sin that could be committed in the church.
quotes.name: Pope Francis

quotes.message: The disease that knowledge brings is arrogance, and the disease that worship brings is showing off.
quotes.name: Ibn Taymiyyah

quotes.message: He's a shy man. Life has taught him not to show off what is most precious to him.
quotes.name: Yann Martel

quotes.message: It is no use to keep private information which you can't show off.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Knowledge and ability were tools, not things to show off.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: The church is never a place to show off. Do your good deeds quietly.
quotes.name: Max Lucado

quotes.message: The better you feel about yourself, the less you feel the need to show off.
quotes.name: Robert Hand

quotes.message: My mother helped me understand how not to show off what I knew, but how to use it so that others might benefit.
quotes.name: Dorothy Height

quotes.message: When everything seems to be set to show me off as intelligent, the fool I always keep hidden takes over all that I say.
quotes.name: Pablo Neruda

quotes.message: Don't pretend to be a great master and don't try to show off your strength.
quotes.name: Gichin Funakoshi

quotes.message: The man that shows off, to that one who wants to convince of his value is to himself.
quotes.name: Domenico Cieri

quotes.message: It takes guts to praise someone's nobility, instead of show off or self-praise.
quotes.name: Chetan Patel

quotes.message: Let your personality speak louder than the show off.
quotes.name: Upasana Gupta
